title: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The list box of the report parameter should retain the modified default value after it has been modified.
SR: Add logic to ensure that the list box of the report parameter saves the modified default value after it has been modified.
